name: Mono (itch) (Fundation Games)
description:
Your boat is fast but can you avoid all other boats on your way? 

Take passengers and cargo to the other side of the river while avoiding all the dangers that risks your life and your delivery.

 Get to the other side before your fuel ends. 

If you crash or your fuel ends, game over!

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
